title: What are you running for? = Qusque tu vas de meme?
creator_credit: Jacques Bobet, Francois Seguillon and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The running of the Fernand Grenier Race, an annual 67 kilometer relay foot race between the villages of La Guadeloupe and Lac Megantic, Quebec, during the first weeked in October. Competitors come from all parts of the province to run in the five-hour marathon. This film covers the entire race, often employing multi-image techniques to show more than one runner at a time. The film has no commentary.
